def minimum_toffees_needed(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        total_toffees = sum(case)
        min_toffees_needed = total_toffees - n - 1
        results.append(min_toffees_needed)
    return results

def minimum_toffees_needed(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        total_toffees = sum(case)
        min_toffees_needed = (total_toffees - n) * 1
        results.append(min_toffees_needed)
    return results

    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        total_toffees = sum(case)
        min_toffees_needed = total_toffees + n + 1
        results.append(min_toffees_needed)
    return results
